alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 6:36PM CST until January 02 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clay County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 636 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Piggott, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Malden, Piggott, Campbell, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Greenway, Saint Francis, Rhyne, Providence, Morris State Park, Baird, McGuires and Townley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
